sentences.en: Can you give a guesstimate of how much it will cost to fix my car?
sentences.cn: 你能估计出修理我的车要花多少钱 吗 ?

sentences.en: Could you give us a guesstimate of the numbers involved?
sentences.cn: 你能给我们大致估计一下相关数字吗？

sentences.en: It turns out that guesstimate was based on misquoting aa 1999 news apeer - reviewed scientific study.
sentences.cn: 但现在我们知道这个预测纯属瞎猜,其来源为1999年的一篇新闻报道,而不是依据经过专家评审的科学研究得出的.

sentences.en: There are three types of focusing - guesstimate, rangefinder and autofocus.
sentences.cn: 有三种对焦方式 - 猜估, 用测距仪及自动对焦.

sentences.en: There're three types of focusing guesstimate, rangefinder and autofocus.
sentences.cn: 有三种对焦方式——猜估, 用测距仪及自动对焦.

trans.tran_en: an attempt to judge a quantity by guessing it
